meanings.definition: To groom a horse by rubbing and cleaning its coat.
meanings.sent1: I currie my horse every morning to keep its coat shiny.
meanings.sent2: She curries the horse before every ride to make sure it looks neat.
meanings.sent3: The horse seemed to enjoy being curried, wagging its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: Currying the horse is like giving it a relaxing massage after a long day.
meanings.sent5: Currying the horse makes the coat gleam under the sun.

meanings.definition: A dish of meat, vegetables, etc., cooked in an Indian-style sauce of strong spices.
meanings.sent1: My mom makes a delicious currie with chicken and potatoes.
meanings.sent2: We ordered a spicy currie from the Indian restaurant down the street.
meanings.sent3: The aroma of the currie filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: The currie was a flavorful explosion in my mouth, awakening my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The rich and aromatic currie warmed us up on a cold winter evening.
